Name: Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears
About the game: 'Delicious - Emily's Hopes and Fears takes you on an adventure like no other before... During the hottest summer of the century, Paige fights to survive a mysterious disease. While Emily stays unwaveringly by her struggling daughter’s side, Patrick embarks on an epic journey through the blistering cold in search of the only cure: a magical flower… Can he save his little girl? ' Enjoy other Delicious - Emily games: Delicious - Emily's Home Sweet Home Delicious - Emily's New Beginning Delicious - Emily's Honeymoon Cruise Delicious - Emily's Wonder Wedding Delicious - Emily's True Love
